description:
As a user
    I want to access the dashboard page
    So that I can view my account information and data
name: OrgUploadAssets Page Functionality

elements.name: Add Asset, Search, Edit and Delete Asset

steps.name: I should navigate to application
I should Sign In into the application
close the terms of service window
Click on Manage Devices
Click on OrgUploadAssets Tab
Verify the Title of OrgUploadAssets Page
I should click on Add Asset
Enter title, full name location and tag
Enter note, Type and description
Upload the image file
Click on save button
Verify the asset details added in table
Click on filter of Description contain in search box and Verify the Result
